org.treetank.access
Class Session

java.lang.Object
  org.treetank.access.Session
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISession
public final class Session
extends Object
implements ISession

Session

Makes sure that there only is a single session instance bound to a TreeTank file.

close

public void close()
           throws org.treetank.exception.AbsTTException
Safely close session and immediately release all resources. If there are running transactions, they will automatically be closed. This is an idempotent operation and does nothing if the session is already closed.

Specified by:
close in interface ISession
Throws:
org.treetank.exception.AbsTTException - If can't close session.
